name: Fedora
onCreateCommand: dnf upgrade --refresh -y && dnf install which git gh wget unzip python3-pip python3-tkinter -y && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install setuptools numpy pygame && ln -s /usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/python && wget https://introcs.cs.princeton.edu/python/code/dist/introcs-1.0.zip && unzip introcs-1.0.zip && cd introcs && python setup.py install --user && cd .. && rm introcs* -rf
